title: Tales of Elhaanai
description: Award-winning book that recently earned acclaim from the prestigious Next Generation Indie Book Awards and Titan Literary Awards!Three womenTwo SonsOne ProphecyThe king is dead...Long live the Queen...Hungry for power, Devona viciously betrayed her loving brother, the King, and his wife. However, before Queen Alanna died, she used her remaining strength to cast a spell and pass her unborn son into the loving care of another.Sixteen years later, oblivious to his heritage, young Alric is forced to live away from others as he and his sister have extremely potent magic coursing their veins – unusually powerful gifts.Alric could've lived the entirety of his life isolated, not knowing who he really is, but the One had a different plan for him. However, when Alric learns of his true identity, so does his aunt. Afraid of Alric's power, she sends assassins to deal with the rising threat.Now, the toughest choice lies in front of Alric – will he rise to claim what is his or hide for the rest of his life?
author: Nicole Patrice Thomas
